title: Refactor existing static pages
description: Refactor the code inside `src/pages` without changing the UI. Only clean up the code and structure it better.

title: Set up routing
description: Connect each static page in `src/pages` to proper app routes using React Router or the current routing system.

title: Create reusable UI components
description: Extract repeating UI elements (buttons, cards, sections, etc.) into reusable components and replace them across pages.

title: Add application layout
description: Create a shared layout (with optional state for things like sidebar, menu, back button) and wrap the pages with it.

title: Move non-page views to components
description: Pages like loading screen, empty state, etc., should be turned into reusable components that can be toggled via props or context.

title: Add i18n support
description: Set up internationalization (i18n) with a folder for translations and support for multiple languages.

title: Add `locales` folder for translations
description: Create a folder `src/i18n` or `src/locales` and store language files (e.g., `en.json`, `fa.json`) for translation keys.

title: Improve Tailwind usage
description: Avoid using arbitrary values like `p-[0.9rem]` and instead use closest default Tailwind spacing or extend the theme in `tailwind.config.js`.

title: Configure theme in Tailwind config
description: Extend Tailwind theme (e.g., spacing, colors) in `tailwind.config.js` to support design tokens without inline brackets.

title: Move SVGs and images to assets
description: Do not embed SVG code directly in components. Save them in `assets` folder and import them as components or images.

title: Replace embedded back icons with components
description: Use icon libraries or imported SVG/image files for back buttons instead of inline SVG markup.
